ing: 3 cloves garlic, peeled and halved, or more to taste
1 1/2 cups light mayonnaise (such as Hellmann'sÂ® Light)
1 teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste
des: "A tasty dressing for fish, poultry and burgers that is zesty and creamy. Light mayonnaise is used to keep the bad fats and calories at bay."
ins: Place roasted red peppers and basil in a food processor; pulse until coarsely chopped and combined. Add lemon juice; pulse 3 times. Scatter garlic halves over mixture; pulse to chop, 4 to 5 times. Add mayonnaise and sugar; pulse until smooth, 5 to 7 times. Season with salt and pepper.
